skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...

security_audit.summary: Official skill from Anthropics skills repository. No security scan required beyond inventory. No issues detected in reviewed files.

content.value_statement: Your artifacts look inconsistent without clear brand rules. This skill applies Anthropic colors and typography to align visuals quickly.
actual_capabilities: Apply Poppins to headings at 24pt and larger
Apply Lora to body text with readable hierarchy
Fallback to Arial and Georgia when fonts are missing
Use official dark, light, and gray brand colors
Cycle accent colors in orange, blue, and green
limitations: Best results require Poppins and Lora installed on the system
Provides styling rules, not original logo or artwork assets
Targets visual formatting guidance, not content generation

use_cases.title: Refresh brand decks
use_cases.description: Align slide colors and fonts to Anthropic brand rules before a launch review.

use_cases.title: Standardize templates
use_cases.description: Apply consistent typography and accents across internal templates.

use_cases.title: Brand docs visuals
use_cases.description: Style documentation visuals to match the corporate brand palette.

prompt_templates.title: Quick brand apply
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand colors and fonts to this artifact. Use Poppins for headings and Lora for body text.

prompt_templates.title: Accent color pass
prompt_templates.prompt: Style shapes with Anthropic accent colors and ensure text uses the correct dark and light palette.

prompt_templates.title: Font fallback check
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply brand typography and use Arial or Georgia if Poppins or Lora are unavailable.

prompt_templates.title: Full guideline audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this artifact and adjust colors, typography, and accents to match Anthropic brand guidelines.

output_examples.input: Style my presentation to Anthropic brand guidelines.
output: Headings set to Poppins with dark text
Body text set to Lora with light gray accents
Shapes use orange, blue, and green accents

best_practices: Specify the artifact type and target medium
Confirm Poppins and Lora availability before export
Use brand dark and light colors for text contrast
anti_patterns: Mixing off brand colors with the official palette
Using decorative fonts that replace Poppins or Lora
Applying accent colors to primary body text

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the guidelines are tool agnostic and can be used in those platforms.

faq.question: What are the limits of the styling rules?
faq.answer: The skill provides color and typography rules, not design assets or logos.

faq.question: Can it integrate with slide tools or docs?
faq.answer: Yes, apply the rules within your presentation or document workflow.

faq.question: Does it handle data safety?
faq.answer: No data is stored by the skill. It only provides styling guidance.

faq.question: What if the fonts are missing?
faq.answer: It falls back to Arial for headings and Georgia for body text.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic branding tips?
faq.answer: It uses specific Anthropic colors and typography rather than generic advice.
